24class HeapObject;
25class MarkBit;
26class Map;

29
30// Describes in which context IncrementalMarking::Step() is used in. This
31// information is used when marking finishes and for marking progress
32// heuristics.
33enum class StepOrigin {
34 // The caller of Step() is not allowed to complete marking right away. A task
35 // is scheduled to complete the GC. When the task isn't
36 // run soon enough, the stack guard mechanism will be used.
37 kV8,
38
39 // The caller of Step() will complete marking by running the GC right
40 // afterwards.
41 kTask
42};
43
44constexpr const char* ToString(StepOrigin step_origin) {
45 switch (step_origin) {
46 case StepOrigin::kV8:
47 return "V8";
48 case StepOrigin::kTask:
49 return "task";
50 }
51}
52
53class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE IncrementalMarking final {
54 public:
55 class V8_NODISCARD PauseBlackAllocationScope final {
56 public:
57 explicit PauseBlackAllocationScope(IncrementalMarking* marking);
58 ~PauseBlackAllocationScope();
59
60 PauseBlackAllocationScope(const PauseBlackAllocationScope&) = delete;
61 PauseBlackAllocationScope& operator=(const PauseBlackAllocationScope&) =
62 delete;
63
64 private:
65 IncrementalMarking* const marking_;
66 bool paused_ = false;
67 };
68
69 V8_INLINE void TransferColor(Tagged<HeapObject> from, Tagged<HeapObject> to);
70
71 IncrementalMarking(Heap* heap, WeakObjects* weak_objects);
72
73 IncrementalMarking(const IncrementalMarking&) = delete;
74 IncrementalMarking& operator=(const IncrementalMarking&) = delete;
75
76 MarkingMode marking_mode() const { return marking_mode_; }
77
78 bool IsMinorMarking() const {
79 return marking_mode_ == MarkingMode::kMinorMarking;
80 }
81 bool IsMajorMarking() const {
82 return marking_mode_ == MarkingMode::kMajorMarking;
83 }
84
85 bool IsStopped() const { return !IsMarking(); }
86 bool IsMarking() const { return marking_mode_ != MarkingMode::kNoMarking; }
87 bool IsMajorMarkingComplete() const {
88 return IsMajorMarking() && ShouldFinalize();
89 }
90
91 bool MajorCollectionRequested() const {
92 return major_collection_requested_via_stack_guard_;
93 }
94
95 bool CanBeStarted() const;
96 void Start(GarbageCollector garbage_collector,
97 GarbageCollectionReason gc_reason);
98 // Returns true if incremental marking was running and false otherwise.
99 bool Stop();
100
101 void UpdateMarkingWorklistAfterScavenge();
102 void UpdateMarkedBytesAfterScavenge(size_t dead_bytes_in_new_space);
103
104 // Performs incremental marking step and finalizes marking if complete.
105 void AdvanceAndFinalizeIfComplete();
106
107 // Performs incremental marking step and finalizes marking if the stack guard
108 // was already armed. If marking is complete but the stack guard wasn't armed
109 // yet, a finalization task is scheduled.
110 void AdvanceAndFinalizeIfNecessary();
111
112 // Performs incremental marking step and schedules job for finalization if
113 // marking completes.
114 void AdvanceOnAllocation();
115
116 bool IsAheadOfSchedule() const;
117
118 bool IsCompacting() { return IsMajorMarking() && is_compacting_; }
119
120 Heap* heap() const { return heap_; }
121 Isolate* isolate() const;
122
123 IncrementalMarkingJob* incremental_marking_job() const {
124 return incremental_marking_job_.get();
125 }
126
127 bool black_allocation() { return black_allocation_; }
128
129 bool IsBelowActivationThresholds() const;
130
131 void MarkBlackBackground(Tagged<HeapObject> obj, int object_size);
132
133 void MarkRootsForTesting();
134
135 // Performs incremental marking step for unit tests.
136 void AdvanceForTesting(v8::base::TimeDelta max_duration,
137 size_t max_bytes_to_mark = SIZE_MAX);
138
139 uint64_t current_trace_id() const { return current_trace_id_.value(); }
140
141 private:
142 class IncrementalMarkingRootMarkingVisitor;
143
144 class Observer final : public AllocationObserver {
145 public:
146 Observer(IncrementalMarking* incremental_marking, intptr_t step_size);
147 ~Observer() override = default;
148 void Step(int bytes_allocated, Address, size_t) override;
149
150 private:
151 IncrementalMarking* const incremental_marking_;
152 };
153
154 void StartMarkingMajor();
155 void StartMarkingMinor();
156
157 void StartBlackAllocation();
158 void PauseBlackAllocation();
159 void FinishBlackAllocation();
160
161 void StartPointerTableBlackAllocation();
162 void StopPointerTableBlackAllocation();
163
164 void MarkRoots();
165 // Returns true if the function succeeds in transitioning the object
166 // from white to grey.
167 bool WhiteToGreyAndPush(Tagged<HeapObject> obj);
168 void PublishWriteBarrierWorklists();
169
170 // Fetches marked byte counters from the concurrent marker.
171 void FetchBytesMarkedConcurrently();
172 size_t GetScheduledBytes(StepOrigin step_origin);
173
174 bool ShouldFinalize() const;
175
176 bool ShouldWaitForTask();
177 bool TryInitializeTaskTimeout();
178
179 // Returns the actual used time.
180 v8::base::TimeDelta EmbedderStep(v8::base::TimeDelta expected_duration);
181 void Step(v8::base::TimeDelta max_duration, size_t max_bytes_to_process,
182 StepOrigin step_origin);
183
184 size_t OldGenerationSizeOfObjects() const;
185
186 MarkingState* marking_state() { return marking_state_; }
187 MarkingWorklists::Local* local_marking_worklists() const {
188 return current_local_marking_worklists_;
189 }
190
191 Heap* const heap_;
192 MarkCompactCollector* const major_collector_;
193 MinorMarkSweepCollector* const minor_collector_;
194 WeakObjects* weak_objects_;
195 MarkingWorklists::Local* current_local_marking_worklists_ = nullptr;
196 MarkingState* const marking_state_;
197 v8::base::TimeTicks start_time_;
198 size_t main_thread_marked_bytes_ = 0;
199 // A sample of concurrent_marking()->TotalMarkedBytes() at the last
200 // incremental marking step.
201 size_t bytes_marked_concurrently_ = 0;
202 MarkingMode marking_mode_ = MarkingMode::kNoMarking;
203
204 bool is_compacting_ = false;
205 bool black_allocation_ = false;
206 bool completion_task_scheduled_ = false;
207 v8::base::TimeTicks completion_task_timeout_;
208 bool major_collection_requested_via_stack_guard_ = false;
209 std::unique_ptr<IncrementalMarkingJob> incremental_marking_job_;
210 Observer new_generation_observer_;
211 Observer old_generation_observer_;
212 base::Mutex background_live_bytes_mutex_;
213 std::unordered_map<MutablePageMetadata*, intptr_t,
214 base::hash<MutablePageMetadata*>>
215 background_live_bytes_;
216 std::unique_ptr<::heap::base::IncrementalMarkingSchedule> schedule_;
217 base::Optional<uint64_t> current_trace_id_;
218
219 friend class IncrementalMarkingJob;
220};
